title: Task
description: Schema for a task document in the Firestore 'tasks' collection.

created_time.description: Timestamp when the task was created, stored as a Firestore timestamp and represented as an ISO 8601 string.

due_date.description: Optional due date for the task.

user_uid.description: UID of the user (from the users collection) who owns this task.

priority.description: Optional priority flag for the task.
